title: 361: Obesity is a Sickness
description: Sal, Adam and Justin have a heated discussion about Dr. Sarah Hallberg's TEDx talk "Reversing Type 2 Diabetes with Ignoring the Guidelines." In this episode they discuss the affect of carbohydrates on the body and how to eat to control appetite, lose fat, be healthy and enhance training. Have Sal, Adam & Justin personally train you with a new video on our new YouTube channel, Mind Pump TV. Be sure to Subscribe for updates. Get MAPS Anabolic, MAPS Performance, MAPS Aesthetic and the Butt Builder Blueprint (The RGB Super Bundle) packaged together at a substantial DISCOUNT at www.mindpumpmedia.com. Get your Kimera Koffee, Mind Pump's first official sponsor, at www.kimerakoffee.com, code "mindpump" for 10% off! Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week our favorite reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts!
